question: Before we start, why do you think it's a big deal to keep the conversation flowing smoothly when chatting with ChatGPT?

options.text: It takes you time, so you make less prompts to ChatGPT
It ensures that ChatGPT can provide relevant and coherent responses over multiple turns
It helps ChatGPT to assess all the information about you and sell it
ChatGPT will create a personalized book about you

explanation: Maintaining context ensures that ChatGPT can provide relevant and coherent responses over multiple turns.

question: So, building on that - what do you think are some good tricks for keeping the conversation on track when you're chatting with ChatGPT?
explanation: Maintaining context requires consistency and relevance to previous interactions, avoiding unrelated or vague information.

content:
Let's start with the self-consistency technique. This technique ensures that ChatGPT provides consistent responses across multiple interactions.

By maintaining a coherent and reliable conversation flow, it becomes easier for users to follow and trust the information provided.
This technique is particularly useful in scenarios where maintaining a coherent narrative is important, such as email composition.

title: Fill in The Gap!
instruction: Let's see if you can create prompts to maintain self-consistency in a conversation.
solution: Subject: Your Input Needed: Quick Employee Survey Hi Team, We're conducting a brief survey to gather your feedback on working at Innotech. It takes only 10-15 minutes, and your responses will help us improve our workplace. Please complete it by the 5th of November. Here is the link. Thanks for helping us make Innotech a better place to work! Best, Jane

title: Ask the Model to Adopt a Persona

content: In the prompt above, you have already used one strategy for getting better results - you asked the model to adopt a persona, HR assistant.

title: Fill in The Gap!
instruction: Now, to maintain self-consistency when composing the following emails, you have to do that again:
solution: Subject: Welcome Our New Team Member! Hi Team, I'm excited to announce that Alex has joined Innotech as Data Analyst in our Marketing Department. Alex comes to us with rich experience, and we are thrilled to have them on board. I'm confident that he will bring great value to our team and help us to achieve our goals. Please join me in welcoming Alex to our company, and feel free to introduce yourself and make him feel at home! Thank you for your continued support and collaboration. Warm regards, Jane

content: Otherwise, you can ask ChatGPT to write an email by providing an example or another strategy for getting better results.

title: Fill in The Gap!
solution: Subject: Welcome Our New Team Member! Hi Team, I'm excited to announce that right after Alex, Emma has joined Innotech too. She took the position of Product Manager in our Product Team. Emma comes to us as a seasoned expert in product management, and we are thrilled to have her on board. I'm confident that she will bring great value to our team and help us achieve our goals. Please join me in welcoming Emma to our company, and be comfortable to introduce yourself to make her feel at home! Thank you for your continued support and collaboration. Best regards, Jane

content:
Did you notice how the previous exercise implemented another tactic of writing clear and specific prompts?

You used delimiters to clearly indicate distinct parts of the input, such as <>.

Moreover, you can specify the desired length of the output by adding:

"Respond in 2 paragraphs or 3 bullet points."

In this lesson, we covered context management in prompts, including techniques for preserving context, the self-consistency technique, and strategies for writing clear instructions and providing reference text.
